title: Clear Saved Game Data?
description: Clear your saved game data from this browser? This action is irreversible.

title: Export Saved Game Data?
description: Export your game data for sharing or use at a later time in another browser, computer or device. Copy the export string below for importing.

title: Import Saved Game Data?
description: Import game data by inputting the export string and pressing the 'Import Save' button.

title: Export or Import to Cloud?
description: Log into or register an account with Playfab below. Export or import your cloud save on any device.

title: Settings
description: Adjust your game preferences and settings. These settings will only be applied to this browser.

title: Patch Notes
description: Read the latest additions, improvements and changes made to Forge & Fortune.

title: Offline Progression
description: Here's what happened while you were offline.
